text: @WhiteHouse Of course he has #COVID19 is the primary issue for which he is lagging behind in polls. His priorities are always himself never others which is why we still don't have a national mask mandate as Texas surpasses NY in cases & deaths. #Trump admin owns this! https://t.co/DyFcT04wHw
